exceptions.exn: Expects a disjunctive pattern with 1 branch or a conjunctive pattern made of 0 patterns.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
None

Goal:
forall s0 s1 : state, umpl_conv_1 s0 = umpl_conv_1 s1 -> s0 = s1

Premises:
state = Map prec_list : Set
umpl_conv_1 = fix umpl_conv_1 (s : state) : state := match s with | @M0 _ => M0 prec_list | @M1 _ a p => M1 prec_list a (upl_conv_1 p) | @M2 _ p0 p1 => M2 prec_list (umpl_conv_1 p0) (umpl_conv_1 p1) end : state -> state
umpl_conv_0_inj : forall s0 s1 : state, umpl_conv_0 s0 = umpl_conv_0 s1 -> s0 = s1
st_compatible_compat_def = fun s0 : state => forall s1 : state, st_compatible s0 s1 -> mpl_compat s0 s1 : state -> Prop
mpl_compat_sym : forall s0 s1 : state, mpl_compat s0 s1 -> mpl_compat s1 s0
st_compatible_compat : forall s0 s1 : state, st_compatible s0 s1 -> mpl_compat s0 s1
predta_compatible = fun d0 d1 : preDTA => forall s0 s1 : state, state_in_dta d0 s0 -> state_in_dta d1 s1 -> st_compatible s0 s1 : preDTA -> preDTA -> Prop
mpl_compat_2 : forall s0 s1 s2 s3 : state, mpl_compat (M2 prec_list s0 s1) (M2 prec_list s2 s3) -> mpl_compat s1 s3
dta_correct = fun d : preDTA => forall (s0 s1 : state) (a0 a1 : ad), MapGet state d a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d a1 = Some s1 -> mpl_compat s0 s1 : preDTA -> Prop
mpl_compat_1 : forall s0 s1 s2 s3 : state, mpl_compat (M2 prec_list s0 s1) (M2 prec_list s2 s3) -> mpl_compat s0 s2
dta_compat = fun d0 d1 : preDTA => forall (s0 s1 : state) (a0 a1 : ad), MapGet state d0 a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d1 a1 = Some s1 -> mpl_compat s0 s1 : preDTA -> preDTA -> Prop
st_compatible = fun s0 s1 : state => forall (c : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s0 c = Some pl0 -> MapGet prec_list s1 c = Some pl1 -> pl_compatible pl0 pl1 : state -> state -> Prop
mpl_compat = fun s0 s1 : state => forall (c : ad) (p0 p1 : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s0 c = Some p0 -> MapGet prec_list s1 c = Some p1 -> pl_compat p0 p1 : state -> state -> Prop
state_ref_ok_M2_destr : forall (s0 s1 : state) (d : preDTA), state_ref_ok (M2 prec_list s0 s1) d -> state_ref_ok s0 d /\ state_ref_ok s1 d
state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset_M2 : forall (s0 s1 : state) (sigma : signature) (pa : pre_ad), state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset (M2 prec_list s0 s1) sigma pa -> state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset s0 sigma (pre_ad_O pa) /\ state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset s1 sigma (pre_ad_I pa)
mpl_compat_4 : forall (s0 s1 : state) (pl : prec_list), mpl_compat (M2 prec_list s0 s1) (M1 prec_list 1%N pl) -> mpl_compat s1 (M1 prec_list 0%N pl)
mpl_compat_3 : forall (s0 s1 : state) (pl : prec_list), mpl_compat (M2 prec_list s0 s1) (M1 prec_list 0%N pl) -> mpl_compat s0 (M1 prec_list 0%N pl)
mpl_compat_6 : forall (s0 s1 : state) (pl : prec_list) (p : positive), mpl_compat (M2 prec_list s0 s1) (M1 prec_list (N.pos p~1) pl) -> mpl_compat s1 (M1 prec_list (N.pos p) pl)
mpl_compat_5 : forall (s0 s1 : state) (pl : prec_list) (p : positive), mpl_compat (M2 prec_list s0 s1) (M1 prec_list (N.pos p~0) pl) -> mpl_compat s0 (M1 prec_list (N.pos p) pl)
predta_compatible_compat_0 = fun (d1 : preDTA) (_ : predta_compatible (M0 state) d1) (s0 s1 : state) (a0 a1 : ad) (H0 : MapGet state (M0 state) a0 = Some s0) (_ : MapGet state d1 a1 = Some s1) => let H2 : Some s0 = Some s0 -> mpl_compat s0 s1 := match H0 in (_ = y) return (y = Some s0 -> mpl_compat s0 s1) with | eq_refl => fun H2 : MapGet state (M0 state) a0 = Some s0 => (fun H3 : MapGet state (M0 state) a0 = Some s0 => let H4 : False := eq_ind (MapGet state (M0 state) a0) (fun e : option state => match e with | Some _ => False | None => True end) I (Some s0) H3 in False_ind (mpl_compat...
preDTA_ref_ok = fun d : preDTA => forall (a : ad) (s : state) (c : ad) (pl : prec_list) (b : ad), MapGet state d a = Some s -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some pl -> prec_occur pl b -> exists s0 : state, MapGet state d b = Some s0 : preDTA -> Prop
udta_conv_1_aux = fix udta_conv_1_aux (d : preDTA) : preDTA := match d with | @M0 _ => M0 state | @M1 _ a s => M1 state a (umpl_conv_1 s) | @M2 _ s0 s1 => M2 state (udta_conv_1_aux s0) (udta_conv_1_aux s1) end : preDTA -> preDTA
udta_conv_0_aux = fix udta_conv_0_aux (d : preDTA) : preDTA := match d with | @M0 _ => M0 state | @M1 _ a s => M1 state a (umpl_conv_0 s) | @M2 _ s0 s1 => M2 state (udta_conv_0_aux s0) (udta_conv_0_aux s1) end : preDTA -> preDTA
prec_list_ref_ok = fun (p : prec_list) (d : preDTA) => forall a : ad, prec_occur p a -> exists s : state, MapGet state d a = Some s : prec_list -> preDTA -> Prop
addr_in_preDTA = fun (d : preDTA) (a : ad) => exists s : state, MapGet state d a = Some s : preDTA -> ad -> Prop
semantic_equiv_0_3 : forall (d : preDTA) (a a' : ad) (l : term_list) (n : nat), rec_term d a (app a' l) (S n) = true -> exists s : state, MapGet state d a = Some s
predta_compatible_compat_2 : forall m : Map state, predta_compatible_compat_def m -> forall m0 : Map state, predta_compatible_compat_def m0 -> predta_compatible_compat_def (M2 state m m0)
st_compatible_compat_0 = fun (s1 : state) (_ : st_compatible (M0 prec_list) s1) (c : ad) (p0 p1 : prec_list) (H0 : MapGet prec_list (M0 prec_list) c = Some p0) (_ : MapGet prec_list s1 c = Some p1) => let H2 : Some p0 = Some p0 -> pl_compat p0 p1 := match H0 in (_ = y) return (y = Some p0 -> pl_compat p0 p1) with | eq_refl => fun H2 : MapGet prec_list (M0 prec_list) c = Some p0 => (fun H3 : MapGet prec_list (M0 prec_list) c = Some p0 => let H4 : False := eq_ind (MapGet prec_list (M0 prec_list) c) (fun e : option prec_list => match e with | Some _ => False | None => True end) I (Some p0) H3 in False_ind (pl_compat...
Z.eq_stepl : forall x y z : Z, x = y -> x = z -> z = y
MapSweep_semantics_3_1 : forall (A : Type) (f : ad -> A -> bool) (m : Map A) (pf : ad -> ad), MapSweep1 A f pf m = None -> forall (a : ad) (y : A), MapGet A m a = Some y -> f (pf a) y = false
Pos.SubMaskSpec_sind : forall (p q : positive) (P : Pos.mask -> SProp), (p = q -> P Pos.IsNul) -> (forall r : positive, (q + r)%positive = p -> P (Pos.IsPos r)) -> (forall r : positive, (p + r)%positive = q -> P Pos.IsNeg) -> forall m : Pos.mask, Pos.SubMaskSpec p q m -> P m
Z.mul_eq_0_l : forall n m : Z, (n * m)%Z = 0%Z -> m <> 0%Z -> n = 0%Z

```coq
intros s0 s1 H.
induction H as [|[|s0' s1'] IH].
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IH. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IH. auto.
Qed.```

original: intros s0 s1 H. induction H as [|[|s0' s1'] IH]. - simpl. auto. - simpl. rewrite <- IH. auto. - simpl. rewrite <- IH. auto.
